content.en: Efficient channel routing: Researchers have developed various algorithms for different channel routing models, such as the times square mode, restricted wire overlap, hexagonal grid, topological, linear time, knock-knee diagonal, and two-layer channel routing models. These algorithms aim to optimize channel routing by minimizing wiring area, number of vias, total wire length, and channel width. They also explore routing multiterminal nets and achieving compact and hierarchical channel routing. These algorithms provide efficient solutions for routing in electronic circuits, improving their performance and reducing their complexity.
content.da: Effektiv kanalrouting: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til forskellige kanalrouteringsmodeller, såsom times square mode, begrænset ledningsoverlap, sekskantet gitter, topologisk, lineær tid, knock-knee diagonal og tolags kanalrouteringsmodeller. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at optimere kanalrouting ved at minimere ledningsareal, antal vias, samlet ledningslængde og kanalbredde. De undersøger også routing af multiterminalnet og opnå kompakt og hierarkisk kanalrouting. Disse algoritmer giver effektive løsninger til routing i elektroniske kredsløb, forbedrer deres ydeevne og reducerer deres kompleksitet.
